query.sql: select o from TaskExt o where 1=1 and (o.key_value=:key_value) and (o.step_id like concat(concat(lower(:task_id)),'%')) and (o.taskType in ('待办','已领取','待领取')) order by o.ct desc
select o from Comment o where 1=1 and (o.key_value=:key_value) and (o.step_id like concat(concat(lower(:task_id)),'%')) order by o.ct asc
